title: Face Perception and Emotion
text: we investigate the influence of prior exposure to stimuli in the visual and auditory modalities that affect our judgment of facial expression and emotion, identity and facial attractiveness. We use psychophysical experiments, eye movement tracking and EEG recordings.

title: Self-motion Perception and Navigation
text: In self-motion perception, we investigate the human factors in efficient and effective way-finding and speed thresholds for road users. We use survey studies, psychophysical experiments, eye movement tracking, virtual reality simulation, computational modeling, and onsite mockup test from different perspectives (e.g., the designers, visual perception, user experience, and engineering).
